snippet.title: SNES Sim City
snippet.description:
The classic Sim City gets the Nintendo treatment!

I love this game, and this SNES versions just gave us soo much extra stuff, it is up to this day my favorite version of the original Sim City.

It is, however, really hard to put in a video why this game is soo brilliant, so I hope you enjoy the first 10 minutes of a practice city, with all the nice help from Dr Wright.

There is a new version of the game comming to the DS soon, but if you have a Wii, this has been on Wii VC for quite a bit now, and its well worth those 800 Wii points.
